--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Something one of the other cons said sent Wildrider whirling around 
in
> laughter. 
> 
> Sinnertwin looked to Rippersnapper. "Huhhhh, Wildrider almost as 
stupid
> as Blot." he noticed.

::DOMNIJOE AND BLINDCHAOS::

    Neither Decepticon said much. Domnijoe silently continues 
unloading the metal pieces. Blindchaos, adhering to his crewmate's 
grin ban, giggles internally. He seems a little too enthusiastic with 
his work.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
